description:
A school marathon poses a daunting challenge for Chiya, but with a little of Rize’s training, she’ll race to the finish for the sake of Ama Usa An!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanojo wa Atsuki Senpuu: Kanojo wa Kimama na Soyokaze
She Is a Fierce Whirlwind, She Is a Carefree Breeze
彼女は熱き旋風 彼女は気ままなそよ風
